title: How to Change a 2 Way Switch and a Light Fixture

steps.headline: Remove the cover from the switch with the two screws, the one above and the one below the switch itself.
Remove the two screws that connect the switch to the box.
Pull out the switch and remove the wires from the switch by un-screwing the two screw located on the side.
Return the wires to the same screws, but on the new switch to ensure the live wire is in the correct place.
Push the wires and switch into the box in the wall.
Screw the switch back onto the box and return the cover.
Take out the light bulb, twist the fixture counterclockwise, and pull the fixture away from the box.
Remove the two wires from the back of the fixture by loosening the screws.
Tighten the screws of the new fixture onto the wires, be sure the wires go to the same screws as the old fixture.
Push the wires into the box, and twist the fixture clockwise into place covering the wires and box.
Screw the light bulb into the new fixture.
Return power to your circuit and enjoy.

text: Changing the switch Remove the cover from the switch with the two screws, the one above and the one below the switch itself. (44 seconds into video) Remove the two screws that connect the switch to the box. (1 minute and 11 seconds into video) Pull out the switch and remove the wires from the switch by un-screwing the two screw located on the side. (2 minutes and 12 seconds into video) Return the wires to the same screws, but on the new switch to ensure the live wire is in the correct place. (3 minutes and 23 seconds into video) Push the wires and switch into the box in the wall. (4 minutes and 8 seconds into video) Screw the switch back onto the box and return the cover. (4 minutes and 25 seconds into video) Changing the light fixture Take out the light bulb, twist the fixture counterclockwise, and pull the fixture away from the box. (6 minutes and 16 seconds into video) Remove the two wires from the back of the fixture by loosening the screws. (6 minutes and 56 seconds into video) Tighten the screws of the new fixture onto the wires, be sure the wires go to the same screws as the old fixture. (7 minutes and 50 seconds into video) Push the wires into the box, and twist the fixture clockwise into place covering the wires and box. (8 minutes and 54 seconds into video) Screw the light bulb into the new fixture. (9 minutes and 17 seconds into video) Return power to your circuit and enjoy.
